title: Embroidery Sample, 1775–1805
medium:
Medium: silk thread and chenille on a silk ground, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound ground (velvet)
creditline: Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund
description: Multicolored embroidery in a floral design on a ground of black velvet with blue and green stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidery Sample, 1775–1805.
1775–1805. Medium: silk thread and chenille on a silk ground, paper
Technique: embroidered on cut and voided supplementary warp pile in a compound ground (velvet). Museum purchase from Au Panier Fleuri Fund. 1932-1-63.
